title: Full TypeScript Support
description:
- [x] Implementation
  - [x] Implement Typescript back-end
  - [x] Implement Typescript compiler module
  - [x] Implement Typescript front-end API
- [x] Internal Testing
  - [x] Test Typescript back-end
  - [x] Test that generated Typescript compiles
  - [x] Test Typescript front-end
- [ ] Review
  - [ ] Review design of Typescript back-end
  - [ ] Review quality of generated code
  - [ ] Review design of Typescript front-end API
- [ ] External Testing
  - [ ] Implement property-based testing against `tezos-codec`
- [ ] Fixup
  - [ ] Ensure that Typescript implementation passes external testing
  - [ ] Adopt suggested changes to back-end, generated middle-end, and front-end API design
- [ ] Documentation
  - [ ] Ensure that back-end is well-documented
  - [ ] Ensure that front-end API is well-documented
- [ ] Publication
  - [ ] Deploy hand-written and machine-generated libraries as a typescript package
  - [ ] Publicize the availability of both packaged library and the compiler project
